'''Beza''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|A woman lies dead on the tiles, her skin discolored with decay. 

Her rent flesh sloughs away to reveal bone. No maggots or bugs have reached her here, which only means that there's more of her left to assault your nostrils.}}
The head of the VTC expedition to Poko Kohara, Beza led her team deep into the ruin after barely fleeing the [Engwithan Titan](/engwithanTitan/) outside. Unfortunately, her expedition unraveled as the soul field within the station began to affect her - as did the monstrosity lurking in the dark. However, it's questionable who was the greater monster - the creatures left behind by Engwith? Or an unscrupulous Vailian woman who wanted to pitch sacrificing [Tikawara](/tikawara/)n [Huana](/huana/) to generate luminous [adra](/adra/), much like Engwith in centuries past?

## =Quests

=
* [The Storms of Poko Kohara](/theStormsOfPokoKohara/): Beza's body is found on level three. You can read her soul here, and take [Beza's Pages](/bezasPages/), a [Ngati Idol](/ngatiIdol/), and [Beza's Toothed Blade](/bezasToothedBlade/) from her body. Beza is later encountered in The Adra Realm, stuck there with Anaharu, her foil and nemesis.
